Posts.EditableText: The tutorial for RPGs told me to call the enemy creation script “Spawn(InsertName)”, no return type, and a single parameter “room”. But it also told me to put it in the game start script, which lacks all of the things said above. Uhhhhhh..... what now?
Posts.HTML: The tutorial for RPGs told me to call the enemy creation script “Spawn(InsertName)”, no return type, and a single parameter “room”. But it also told me to put it in the game start script, which lacks all of the things said above. Uhhhhhh..... what now?

Posts.EditableText:
No, you don't put it in the game start script. It goes in the on enter room description.

Can you provide the link to the RPG tutorial?
